t: What's the difference between a $60 longboard on Amazon and a $150-200 longboard? - Quora
s: Answer: The difference? Your life. I’m experienced enough to tell you that if you are serious about skateboarding or ONLY your own physical health, invest in decent quality equipment. Even if you are just casually riding in your own driveway, a cheap board will get you hurt.
